CustomField.formula: IF( PricebookEntry.Product2.Name = 'SALESPAD INVENTORY MANAGER - ESSENTIALS', List_Price_Total__c * 2.75 , IF( PricebookEntry.Product2.Name = 'SALESPAD INVENTORY MANAGER - ADDITIONAL WAREHOUSES', List_Price_Total__c *2.75, IF( PricebookEntry.Product2.Name = 'SALESPAD INVENTORY MANAGER - ADDITIONAL USERS', List_Price_Total__c *2.75, NULL ) ) )
CustomField.label: Subscription exception Products
